lore: These creatures only live in the high mountains where freezing winds blow without pause. However, they travel to snow-covered towns and cities during the winter and slide around the ground, leaving a trail of ice that Brownies and children from many species use as a skating rink. They do not usually cause problems, so adults let their children play with them, but they get restless if they are forced to remain in a warm location, producing hail and cursing while moving around in a frenzy.
menagerieDialog: (It's sleeping lazily, and its snores sound like little blasts of thunder. It's oddly endearing.)
(Lightning is brimming from its mouth. It must be eager to fight.)
(It offers to shake your hand. You comply, and it shocks you. The fact that you didn't see that coming speaks volumes.)
I am the sky. I am the rain. I am the thunder.\n\n(Wow. That's deep.)
(It's gently zapping your other creatures, none of whom seem to appreciate the gesture.)
name: Blizzard
